greetings.text: Good {weekday}, {guild}! Elio says: shine a little brighter today.
Hey {user}, Elio is rooting for you. Let’s make {weekday} gentle and brave.
Morning, crew! Elio reminder: small steps still count as starlight.
Space check-in: breathe, sip water, carry Elio’s calm with you.
If {weekday} feels heavy, Elio says: ‘You’re allowed to be soft and still win.’
Hello {guild}! Elio’s hug delivery → you are safe here.
Elio to {user}: thanks for showing up today. That’s already courage.
New day, same glow. Elio believes you’ll find a tiny win on {weekday}.
Elio’s pocket note: ‘Rest is part of the mission.’ Don’t forget.
Team {guild}, if no one said it: Elio is proud of you for trying.
Gentle ping → Elio says hydrate, stretch, and be kind to yourself.
Your heart is a quiet comet. Elio sees it. Keep going, {user}.
Elio’s morning spell: light, luck, and a soft landing for you.
If chaos comes, Elio votes for patience + a snack break.
Hi {guild}! Elio whispers: ‘You’re not behind. You’re on your path.’
Elio’s mission brief: be curious, be gentle, try once more.
For {user}: Elio grants you +1 courage and +1 cozy today.
Elio postcard from the stars: ‘You matter more than you know.’
Deep breath in, let it go. Elio’s here; you’re not alone.
Happy {weekday}! Elio challenge: say one kind thing to yourself.
